properties.Description:
Holiday Inn Express Simi Valley
2550 Erringer Rd, Simi Valley, CA 93065
Tel: (805) 584 - 6006

Hotel group rate: $119/night (max. of 4 persons/room)
Book online or call the above number and mention the Landrian/Gonzalez wedding.
Group rates are available until September 05, 2017 or until the room block sells out.

properties.attraction: Best Western Posada Royale Hotel & Suites
properties.Description:
Best Western Posada Royale Hotel & Suites*
1775 Madera Rd, Simi Valley, CA 93065
Tel: (805) 584 - 6300

Hotel group rate: $125/night (max. of 4 persons/room)
Book online (using group ID N40CV2M8) or call the above number and mention the Landrian/Gonzalez wedding.
Group rates are available until September 14, 2017 or until the room block sells out.
*Complimentary shuttle service to/from the wedding venue will be available for guests who stay at the Best Western
